product_name: Pearl Izumi Impact Bike Jersey - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: A reliable choice for many rides to come, the Pearl Izumi Impact bike jersey blends smooth performance and cool comfort. Polyester fabric is highly breathable and moves sweat to outer surface for quick evaporation. Fabric provides UPF 20 sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. 10 in. front zipper lets you control ventilation. The Pearl Izumi Impact bike jersey has a semifitted design, so it's neither too tight nor too loose.
short_description: A reliable choice for many rides to come, the Pearl Izumi Impact bike jersey blends smooth performance and cool comfort.
